name: Soul Saga!  A J-RPG inspired by Playstation classics.
blurb: A love letter to J-RPG classics from the Playstation era like Final Fantasy, Breath of Fire, Suikoden, and Persona.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Playstation 4 / Vita! ============================== A key to download Soul Saga from Sony's online store for the Vita or Playstation 4! ============================== \r\nIf you would like a PS4/Vita key on any other tier level, please add an additional $10 to your pledge!

I Want Soul Saga! ============================== A DRM free digital copy of Soul Saga for the PC, Linux, or Mac!  Estimated retail value is $20, so you get to save some money!\r\n============================== If you think of a new reward tier you'd really like to pledge to, please let me know and I will try to add it for you!

WiiU Stand-alone! ============================== 
This will get you a WiiU key to Soul Saga if we reach the stretch goal!  This does not come with a Steam or DRM-Free PC/Linux/Mac copy of the game.
============================== 
If you would like the WiiU key on any other pledge level, please add $10 to your order and message me that you've done so.
I want Soul Saga on my desktop! ============================== A DRM free copy of the game, and some high resolution wallpapers for your desktop!

WiiU! ============================== This will get you a DRM-Free digital copy of Soul Saga for the PC, Linux, and Mac, and also a key for a digital download for the WiiU! ============================== If you would like the WiiU key on any other pledge level, please adjust your pledge to have an extra $10 and then message me!

PS4 / Vita and PC/Linux/Mac! ============================== This will get you a DRM-Free digital copy of Soul Saga for the PC, Linux, and Mac, and also a key for a digital download for the Vita or PS4! ============================== If you would like the Vita or PS4 key on any other pledge level, please adjust your pledge to have an extra $10 and then message me!

I Wanna Help Out! ============================== Includes digital copy of the game, high resolution wallpaper graphics, and PRIVATE BETA builds for PC, Linux, and Mac! ============================== Being part of the closed beta allows you to get your voice heard when it matters most!  Your input can directly effect how Soul Saga ends up to help make it a game we all love!
A True J-Rocker ============================== Digital copy of the game, high resolution wallpaper graphics, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

I <3 Soul Saga! ==============================  Includes digital copy of the game, high resolution wallpaper graphics, digital copy of soundtrack, a pdf copy of the instruction booklet, and PRIVATE BETA builds for PC, Linux, and Mac! ============================== Being part of the closed beta allows you to get your voice heard when it matters most!  Your input can directly effect how Soul Saga ends up to help make it a game we all love!
Soul Saga Poker ============================== The I <3 Soul Saga pack and a pack of limited edition collectible Soul Saga themed playing cards!
Soul Saga in the palm of your hands ============================== The I <3 Soul Saga pack and a physical copy of Soul Saga in a Soul Saga themed amaray case!
Shirts! ============================== The I <3 Soul Saga pack and a Disastercake T-Shirt!
Vita/PS4 key, Physical PC/Linux/Mac versions in an amaray case, physical OST, and the softcover artbook!
Physical Game and Physical Soundtrack! ============================== The I <3 Soul Saga pack, a physical copy of Soul Saga in a Soul Saga themed amaray case, and a physical copy of the Soundtrack!
WiiU key, Physical PC/Linux/Mac versions in an amaray case, physical OST, and the softcover artbook!
DRM-Free or Steam PC/Linux/Mac key, Physical copy in an amaray case, physical OST, and the softcover artbook!
Digital Art Book ============================== I <3 Soul Saga Pack and a digital version of the Soul Saga art book!
Art Book ============================== I <3 Soul Saga Pack and a limited edition softcover Soul Saga art book!
Soul Collector Pack ============================== I <3 Soul Saga Pack, the soft cover art book, collectible Soul Saga themed playing cards, and a physical copy of the game and soundtrack!
Soul Collector Pack ============================== I <3 Soul Saga Pack, the soft cover art book, collectible Soul Saga themed playing cards, and a physical copy of the game and soundtrack!

It's not a doll, it's a figurine! ============================== I <3 Soul Saga Pack and a figurine of Elise!\r\nApprox. 12 centimeters tall.  You'll be sent a survey sometime after the Kickstarter to clarify whether you want it pre-painted or a blank "paint it yourself" model.
Lord of the Otaku ============================== Soul Collector Pack, a Disastercake T-Shirt, and a figurine of Elise!

Item Master ============================== Lord of the Otaku Pack... and name a unique in-game item and write it's flavor text!  The item will be hidden in the world of Oterra for the bravest of treasure hunters to discover!  This is possibly the best way in the world to propose to your significant other... if they can find the item.

Hey, look! That's my NPC! ============================== I <3 Soul Saga Pack, create an Item with your own unique flavor text and name, and... design the outfit, name, and personality of an NPC to go in the game!  The name must be lore-friendly and the outfit will be chosen using existing NPC models, and then the texture can be modified to be unique for your character. ============================== You also have the option to create an alternate outfit for the main character!  ============================== You can also decided if Mithos can recruit this character into his Guild!

Hey, look! That's my NPC! + Swag! ============================== Item Master, plus design the outfit, name, and personality of an NPC to go in the game! The name must be lore-friendly and the outfit will be chosen using existing NPC models, and then the texture can be modified to be unique for your character. If that lingo sounds foreign to you, please let me know in the comments and I can clarify!

Be a part of the SAGA!
==============================
I <3 Soul Saga Pack, create an Item with your own unique flavor text and name, and... name and completely design a brand new NPC!  This NPC can be a human, animal, or robot.  You get your choice of how it functions in the game too!  A hidden shop keeper with rare items?  A rival Guild Leader to Mithos?  Or will your character join Mithos' guild?  Its your choice!
============================== If you would like your NPC to participate in combat, please select the "Be a part of the BATTLE" tier located below.

Be a part of the BATTLE! ============================== I <3 Soul Saga Pack, create an Item with your own unique flavor text and name, and... name and completely design a brand new NPC that can engage in combat! This NPC can be a human, animal, or robot. You get your choice of how it functions in the game too! A hidden shop keeper with rare items? A rival Guild Leader to Mithos? Or will your character join Mithos' guild? Its your choice!

Combat Designer! ============================== \r\nI <3 Soul Saga pack and... help design an enemy from scratch including it's appearance, animation style, special combat skills, sound effects, and anything else related to the enemy!  You will be placed in the credits as an Assistant Combat Designer!

Level Designer! ============================== \r\nThe "Item Master" Pack and... become a Level Designer!  You will help create a lore friendly side story, design the story's characters using existing artwork, design the map using existing artwork, the gameplay, the goals, the whole freaking shebang!  Then your name is placed into the credits as a Level Designer!

I own your Soul (Saga) ============================== \r\nWell, kinda...  What really happens is you become an Associate Producer!  This means you get a direct line of contact with me via Skype or Google Chat through the whole production of Soul Saga and also credited as an Associate Producer in the game!  You will be the first to see changes happening in the game and will be constantly asked for input regarding different things about the game including story, music, art, and gameplay!  It's practically a backstage pass into the life of a passionate indie developer.  With this much exposure to the game, you will help more than anyone else shape what Soul Saga becomes!  You must be 18 or older since you have to sign a NDA and other legal papers.  This tier includes all of the other rewards as well!
